divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside on the patio with our dogs and I sat in one of the chairs tosmoke. It was a beautiful, cool and calm dayNew Years Day and I looked up to seehow clear the whole sky was. Nearly straight above I saw some white objects andat first thought they were seagulls since I had seen a flock the previous week.But they looked more like lights and there were 3 forming a perfect triangle andone directly below them. I could not see any wing movement, just a steadywhite.They seemed to be very high, higher than most planes I have seen here. Iwatched them for a moment and the 3 moved slowly into an elongated trianglewhile the 4th remained the same distance below. I called a friend on the phonebut she didnt see them she looked up. She lives about 40 blocks south and 1.5miles east My friend inside came out and I had to point them out to her. She sawthem and said they were birds. By this time the 3 had formed a perfect verticalline with the 4th one still the same distance from then. They had moved towardsthe east. The 3 once again moved into a perfect triangle, then an elongated oneand a straight veritcal line with the 4th one moving at the same speed with themto the east. They began to fade and then I couldnt see any of them. I saw twoplanes during this time about 15 minutes but I dont recall anything more thanthey were at a much lower altitude, one traveling NW to SE and one E to W. Ialso saw a few birds at about 300 feet.
